content.raw: I was having a problem with setting the 'tojson' option to false as the result was always converted to Json. Changino how the 'tojson' option like that solved thE problem, but it seems like I didn't notice that the latch has to be set outside the subscribe function, I'll fix it.
content.html: I was having a problem with setting the 'tojson' option to false as the result was always converted to Json. Changino how the 'tojson' option like that solved thE problem, but it seems like I didn't notice that the latch has to be set outside the subscribe function, I'll fix it.
